Full love, is a novel focused on Neil (Ben Afleck), a man who is torn between two loves: Marina, the European woman who came to America to be with him, and Jane, a passion of his old hometown with which it reconnects. Malick explores how love and its many phases and seasons - passion, affection, obligation, regret, indecision - can transform, destroy lives and redefine.
